name: My Boss Leidi
description:
Nicholas is a hardworking college student who is burnt out from school and work.
Everything looks grim for him until he is graced by the presence of the beautiful blue-haired Leidi, his boss at his part-time job.
What exciting adventure will these two characters dive into?

Featuring artwork created by Lök Polymorfa and story written by Playerboy117.

Sit back and relax with this 20-minute 18+ kinetic novel.

Now on Steam!

English and Chinese languages available.
